about_the_game:
Nonogram Animal Griddlers, is a logical puzzle game, known as Nonograms, Picross or Griddlers.
These puzzles can be solved with the numbers on the side of the grid cells. These indicate a group of contiguous filled squares. Between the groups there is at least one empty square.
Completing these puzzles will form a picture. In this game all the puzzles will form images of all different kinds of animals.

The game is designed so you can solve puzzles as if you had a puzzle book.
You can take your time.
Play any puzzles, without having to unlock puzzles.
No punishment for errors or miss clicks.
The game automatically saves any change to the puzzles, making you able to quit and continue a puzzle anytime you want.

The puzzles are divided into 6 different packs, with a 1 to 6 star rating based on the size of the puzzles.
It’s best to begin with the smaller more easy puzzles, before starting on the bigger puzzles.

Demo Features:
- Contains 5 of full version 120 unique puzzles.
- All puzzles will form pictures of animals of all kinds.
- Relaxing classical music.
- Logic puzzles without pencil and paper, but it plays exactly the same!
- Train you logical and abstract thought processes.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Nonogram Animal Griddlers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: If you’re a fan of logical puzzles and Animals this might be a fun game for you. These logic puzzles of Japanese origin will train your logical and abstract thought processes.
